node.html:
• Translated business questions to use cases and developed efficient ML algorithms.
  • Implemented a comparative framework in Python to effectively choose algorithms of data-imputation, resulting in a 30% improvement in model performance for
    revenue-pricing and prediction.
  • Collaborated with senior and staff data scientists to evaluate the implementations.

• Generated synthetic population data for a million residents, using generative algorithms and models such as CTGAN, IPU and Autoencoders
  • Improved the ETL pipeline by adding new data sources, and sanitization methods.
  • Developed A Single Page Application (SPA) in ReactJS that increased visibility and usage by 20% (unique users)

• Redeveloped the organization website using ReactJS, Leaflet.js, Google Maps API and improved SEO by 30%, and loading time by 25%.
  • Developed a REST API using Django, following DevOps & Agile methodology.
  • Developed a web scraping program using Selenium to scrape 10GBs of digital news, to be fed into an ETL pipeline.
  • Implemented a CI/CD pipeline using Docker, GitHub Actions cutting down on deployment time by 20%.

• Devised an object-localization radar leveraging deep learning models which resulted in 3 publications at international conferences and journals such as IEEE RADAR, ASPAI, Sensors
  • Developed a trusted execution system prototype for federated machine learning with lower communication bounds. (Resulted in a publication at AAAI)
  • Technologies used: Python, Tensorflow, RasberryPi, RTL-SDR

• Developed a full-stack web-app using ReactJS, Django and SQL.
  • Tested both internal and production-ready UI components and API endpoints with Jest and Postman
  • Created, maintained and tested databases using SQL and Django, with optimum database performance

Courses I've assissted :

  • Introduction to Machine Learning
  • Computer Security and Privacy
  • Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies
